title: New update has a lot of movement on the home screen (apps bounce when I swipe to new screen)
content: This new Android 11 update has way too much home screen movement. My apps jiggle/bounce when I slide from one part of my home screen to the other. The home screen zooming in thing is borderline nauseating and I cannot for the life of my figure out how to disable these features. Any solutions?? It's just giving me a headache ðŸ˜…
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
